response.original_title: Garfield and Friends: A Cat and His Nerd
response.overview: He's not always purr-fectly well behaved, but Garfield is always there for Jon and Odie - there on the couch, there eating lasagne...but he's also there as a friend. So whether Jon's dealing with a lackluster love life, courting car trouble or even being conned by a convict, Garfield is one fat and furry friend for life!
response.title: Garfield and Friends: A Cat and His Nerd

titles.title: Garfield and Friends a Cat and his Nerd
